name: Some Kind of Wonderful
description:
Welcome to the whimsical world of Hatched and Patched designer Anni Downs. Whether you love appliqué, patchwork, punchneedle, or hand stitchery, you’ll find the perfect project in this diverse array of quilts, sewing accessories, bags, and home accents. Each of the 16 lighthearted designs reflects Anni’s favorite things—relaxing at home, shopping, traveling, and of course, sewing. Her passion for hand stitching plays a fanciful role in most all the projects with her signature quirky embroidery designs.

Among the projects are three charming quilts as well as a pillow, table runner, and other decorative accessories to warm your everyday surroundings. Whether you’re running to the local mall or traveling abroad, Anni’s handy bag, coin purse, and travel document holder will keep everything in its place. And every quilter can use Anni’s delightful pincushion, needle book, and sewing case to keep his or her sewing accessories organized!

name: Issue 8 - Vignette - PRE-ORDER
description:
Information for Issue 8 is unavailable at this moment ... information should be available very soon.
 
Vignette is Leanne Beasley's wonderful new magazine.
 
This beautiful magazine has lovely stitchery projects and part 13 & 16 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block mystery quilt, plus much more ... this I will leave as a surprise!
 
This is a must have for any Leanne's House fan.
 
My special price for Vignette is $17.50, not the RRP $17.95.
 
FREE postage for this item within Australia.
 
Postage rate for New Zealand, Singapore are quoted. Elsewhere is quoted at a flat international rate.

name: Vignette Back Issues - Issues 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 & 7
description:
Vignette is Leanne Beasley's wonderful new magazine.

Issue details -

Issue 1 ...
This beautiful issue has -  projects 'Remember' notice board and part 1 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block BOM.

Issue 2 ...
This beautiful issue has -  projects Hexagon Quilt and part 2 & 3 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block BOM.
 
Issue 3 ...
This beautiful issue has a sweet little Rosemary for Remembrance Pincushion and part 4 & #5 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block BOM, plus completing your Hexagon Quilt plus another lovely quick quilt ... 

Issue 4 ...
This beautiful issue has a sweet little stitchery project and part 8 & 12 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block BOM, plus completing your Hexagon Quilt and much more.
 
Issue 5 ...
This beautiful magazine has a sweet little stitchery project and part 6 & 7 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block mystery quilt.

Issue 6 ...
This beautiful magazine has lovely stitchery projects using linen and part 10 & 11 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block mystery quilt.

Issue 7 ...
Stitchery projects and part 13 & 16 of 'Vignette in Stitches' which is a 9 block mystery quilt.

This is a must have for any Leanne's House fan.
 
My special price for Vignette is $17.50 per issue, not the RRP $17.95.
 
FREE postage for this item within Australia.
 
Postage rate for New Zealand, Singapore are quoted. Elsewhere is quoted at a flat international rate.

Please note...
-  the 3 issues together total almost 500g ... so to remain at large letter postage rates ... so if other items are added the postage will need to be adjusted to parcel rates ... quotes can be calculated so please ask.

name: Thread Packs  for Vignette BOM
description:
